solution_line_template: In her first year, Tara's dad attended {games_per_year}*{attendance_percent} = <<{games_per_year}*{attendance_percent}={first_year_attended}>>{first_year_attended} games.
Then, in her second year, Tara's dad attended {first_year_attended} - {games_fewer} = <<{first_year_attended}-{games_fewer}={second_year_attended}>>{second_year_attended} games.
